bibl.title: Rome, the Greek World, and the East. Volume 3. The Greek World, the Jews, and the East. Edited by Hannah M. COTTON and Guy M. ROGERS. (Studies in the History of Greece and Rome.)

publisher.orgName: The University of North Carolina Press

bibl.note: Reproduction de 18 articles (1971-2004). - Pp. vii-x: H.M.C. and G.M.R., Preface; - xi-xvii: H.M.C., Introduction; - 487-509: F.M., Author's Epilogue: Re-drawing the Map? [see in part. pp. 493-494, about the study of Graeco-Roman Egypt, "one of the most challenging tasks facing the students of the ancient world]"; - 511-516: Index.
